Consider the statements with reference to the 3x3 matrices A and B and k is a constant.
I) \(A = kB \Rightarrow |A| = k|B|\).
II) adj (AB)=adj(B) adj(A).
III) for a matrix C, if A=BC \(\Rightarrow\) C=B⁻¹A
Which of the above statements are correct?
options: Only I and II are correct
Only II and III are correct
